title: Please allow Wolf to go over walls
body: If you use Kindred's W near a wall, Wolf can't attack anything on the other side of the wall - he will reach the end of his leash range as he tries to go around. This really sucks when you use W and try to follow someone over a wall to continue a duel.

replies.body: herpderp kindred is op cancer bugs don't need fixes
touché

Thought you wanted the wolf camp to jump through the jungle

Does Wolf really need to feel even more like a spell particle and less like an entity on the field? I already think Kindred's kit is really lousy at making it feel like you're playing "them" instead "her".

Orianna did that concept so much better, even Lulu + Pix feels more like a "them" champion than Kindred.

Another one is how Wolf shouldn't repeatedly try to attack Lamb's target if they're out of range, since it forces him to constantly race to the edge of the area and then teleport back, thus making him pretty useless.

this bug makes no sense since wolf is a ghost thing i may not like kindred but this def needs a fixing but then remember riot fixed a bug on talon a long time ago the was reducing his damage and that got him nerfed
